snippet: Ryan Seacrest signs a deal with Civic Entertainment Group, Pandora reports its third quarter earnings, Netflix makes a deal to stream Disney movies, and news photographers defend one of their own.
abstract: Ryan Seacrest signs a deal with Civic Entertainment Group, Pandora reports its third quarter earnings, Netflix makes a deal to stream Disney movies, and news photographers defend one of their own.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: A New Venture for Seacrest, Pandora Earnings, Disney on Netflix, and a Photo Controversy
